description: Number of polygons of length 4n on L-lattice.
references: I. G. Enting and A. J. Guttmann, Self-avoiding polygons on the square, L and Manhattan lattices, J. Phys. A 18 (1985), 1007-1017.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
